dist.hmm

Class StateSequenceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.hmm.StateSequenceCalculator

  • public class StateSequenceCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    A Viterbi algorithm implementation that uses log probabilities to prevent underflow. The Viterbi algorithm is used to determine the most likely state sequence for a given sequence of observations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
